channel.title: Matrix running problem?
channel.description:
So when i try and Run matrix source sided, it comes up with this... [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/w0nszq.jpg[/img]
How would i fix this?

item.title: Matrix running problem?
item.dc:creator: @sub-degree sub-degree
item.description:
@sub-degree wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:6, topic:465189”][quote author=sub-degree link=topic=569991.msg4132052#msg4132052 date=1351212181]

Post the contents of your Running.bat file

Sure here you go:

@echo off @title Running java -XX:-OmitStackTraceInFastThrow -Xms2048m -Xmx4096m -cp bin;data/libs/netty-3.5.2.Final.jar;data/libs/FileStore.jar com.rs.Launcher false false true pause

Alright and how much RAM do you have?

1.00GB :L
[/quote]

And that’s the problem. The batch file is trying to allocate about 6GB of RAM to run.

remove

-Xms2048m -Xmx4096m

And you should be good.[/quote]
Works fine now, Thanks for help (y)

Read full topic

item.title: Matrix running problem?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“sub-degree, post:5, topic:465189”][quote author=zyle1992 link=topic=569991.msg4132042#msg4132042 date=1351211637]

Post the contents of your Running.bat file

Sure here you go:

@echo off @title Running java -XX:-OmitStackTraceInFastThrow -Xms2048m -Xmx4096m -cp bin;data/libs/netty-3.5.2.Final.jar;data/libs/FileStore.jar com.rs.Launcher false false true pause

Alright and how much RAM do you have?
[/quote]
1.00GB :L[/quote]

And that’s the problem. The batch file is trying to allocate about 6GB of RAM to run.

remove

-Xms2048m -Xmx4096m

And you should be good.
